summary: a small story is what I want to share.
descriptionHtml:
this is not a mod probable, I just put a idle inside, or u can use the idle to make your own story. i will use this topic to share some storyboard with skyrim. I will try to update until I think it is enough or I am tired.

This is one of the chapter of my story in my mind, , It is about fantasy medieval, romantic and magic, combat and humanity. They share same background setting but just happen on different place and different time. I don't want to share too many content because I think I am still native and not enough to write and explain whole thing what I really want to, which is something can make people get the feeling and resonance.

Main story is call "The other end of tomorrow (明天的彼端/明日的另一端)", Which is mean: wandering and missing someone or something in other place or other time.

And Top (tears of princess) is just the one of the cheaper of the main story.

"Top" is talk about our main actor Thiesdya, A princess of Kingdom Preteron.  She glowing Through with many suffering and at last become a queen to rule her kingdom...   

[youtube]zgi9SNbzOSQ[/youtube]
author: dualsun
